Package org.hkijena.acaq5.api.data.traits

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ACAQMutableTraitConfiguration
    A mutable ACAQTraitConfiguration
    ACAQTraitConfiguration
    Processes algorithm traits of an ACAQAlgorithm
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ACAQDataSlotTraitConfiguration
    Serializable description of how annotations transfer through an ACAQAlgorithm Annotations are either added, removed, or ignored.
    ACAQDataSlotTraitConfiguration.Deserializer
    Deserializes the configuration
    ACAQDataSlotTraitConfiguration.Serializer
    Serializes the configuration
    ACAQDefaultMutableTraitConfiguration
    The default ACAQTraitConfiguration.
    ACAQDefaultMutableTraitConfiguration.Serializer
    Serializes the configuration
    ACAQTraitTransferTask
    Task that transfers traits from an input slot to the output slot
    ACAQTraitTransferTask.Deserializer
    Deserializes an ACAQTraitTransferTask
    ACAQTraitTransferTask.Serializer
    Serializes an ACAQTraitTransferTask
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ACAQTraitModificationOperation
    Operations for trait modification
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    AddsTrait
    Annotates an ACAQAlgorithm to add given trait to all output slots Attaching this annotation automatically runs addsTraits() in ACAQTraitConfiguration if autoAdd is true
    AddsTraits
    Array of AddsTrait
    BadForTrait
    Annotates an ACAQAlgorithm to be ineffective against a specified trait
    BadForTraits
    Annotates an ACAQAlgorithm to be ineffective against a specified trait
    ConfigTraits
    Configures the behavior of a standard ACAQDefaultMutableTraitConfiguration that is generated by ACAQAlgorithm
    GoodForTrait
    Annotates an ACAQAlgorithm to be effective for a specified trait
    GoodForTraits
    Array of GoodForTrait
    RemovesTrait
    Annotates an ACAQAlgorithm to remove given trait from all output slots Attaching this annotation automatically runs removesTraits() in ACAQTraitConfiguration if autoRemove is true
    RemovesTraits
    Array of RemovesTrait
